resources:
Lightning Launcher ➜ Lightning Launcher Lightning Launcher Add Group - Hidden Old settings have been migrated
Use English Language Force Lightning Launcher to be in English.\n(Do not translate to your language.)
Edit Mode Change groups, add websites, and more.
Close Launcher window after opening apps If enabled, Lightning Launcher will close itself when you open an app.
Use Quest Native Launching Launches apps with a method similar to the Quest\'s default launcher. \nTurning this off will change how windows are organized, and could cause issues.
Scale Target size for icons/banners.\nMay vary with window size. Margin Target spacing between icons/banners.\nMay vary with window size.
VR Apps Phone Apps TV Apps Panel Apps Websites Use group as default for new: Below App Icons Below App Banners
Lightning Launcher Shortcuts Shortcuts Make Lightning Launcher easier to access. Get Latest Update Notify me of New Updates Click to show notifications for new updates. \nYou previously turned this off when skipping an update.
Behavior Wallpaper & Style Display as Banner Display as Icon Always Show Names More Options Advanced Settings Refresh Interface Refresh & Reset Launch Preferences Search Settings Settings Backup Background Translucency Preserve Details with Translucency Preserve background details when passthrough is off,\nuse fancy partial translucency when it\'s on.\nWorks best with dark backgrounds. Makes the background of Lightning Launcher translucent in passthrough. Quest 3 Passthrough Blur Allows for a blurred background while in passthrough. Limits the amount of translucency.
Dark Mode If on, labels will appear white on a dark background. Enable Groups Turn this off to show all apps at once, without grouping. \nSearch and settings icons will also be hidden. \n \nUse the back button on your remote/controller to open Settings. Wider Groups Increases the minimum width of group buttons, \nensuring longer names don\'t get cut off. \n \nOnly noticeable when there are many groups.
Reset All App Labels to Default Default Groups Refresh Icons
Show Playtimes Show playtime on app banners. \n\nRequires usage data access Usage Data Access Open a settings page where you can turn on or off the ability for apps such as Lighting Launcher to view you playtime & usage data. Fully Close Lightning Launcher Fully closes Lightning Launcher. (You can then reopen it) \n\nThis lets you troubleshoot issues without rebooting.
Install Quest Game Tuner to view playtime charts
Usage Data Access Required To see your playtime in Lighting Launcher, \nyou need to grant it access to app usage data. \n \nIf Quest Game Tuner is also installed, clicking the playtime will open a daily or monthly chart. \n \nYou can hide the playtime button in Advanced Settings.
Long Press to Edit When on, long-pressing an app will enter edit mode and select it. \nWhen off, long-pressing an app will show details.
Show Web Search Engines in Searches Show Hidden Apps in Searches Export Settings Import Settings Export Groupings Import Groupings
Reset Icon Tune with Quest Game Tuner lets you adjust resolution, FPS, and more!
⚙
Turning this option off will hide the top bar when not in Edit Mode. \n \nThe settings button will also be hidden when not in Edit Mode.\n \nInstead, press the back button to open settings.
For the best experience, you must install Lightning Browser to open websites in Lightning Launcher.\n \n(Alternatively, you can try to change the browser in Settings -> Advanced Settings)
For the best experience, you must update Lightning Browser. = Open the website again after installation is complete
Websites in Lightning Launcher Easily Access Websites & Web Apps
Websites will appear as apps in the launcher.\n \nYou can also search the web from the search bar.
Audio in the Background
After being minimized, added websites can continue running, playing, and recording sound until fully closed. (Audio latency may occur.)\n
Browser Selection
On Quest devices, you can launch in Meta Quest Browser, which supports VR web content. \nThe default can be set in Advanced Settings.
Add a Website Enter Any Website URL Enter a valid URL This website is already in %1$s Added websites can play background audio Add to %s
Shortcuts Services Easily Access Lightning Launcher By enabling the shortcut service, Lightning Launcher will open when you hover over the chosen icon on the dock. Enable the Shortcut Service 1. Use the button below to open Android\'s accessibility settings. \n2. Select the service you wish to enable. \n3. Turn on the service with the upper switch. \n4. Click "Allow" when prompted.
Continue to Accessibility Settings
Important Info Cancel Got It! Confirm
Open in App\'s Own Window Open in Phone-Style Window Open in Small 4:3 Window Open in Medium-Size Window Open in Large 16:9 Window Open in Huge 16:9 Window Open in Wide 21:9 Window
Default for Websites: Open in Lightning Browser Open in Quest Browser Tab Open as Quest Browser Web App Try to Open in System Default
Move Copy
Click an app to select it or click here to select all 1 app selected, click a group to move it 1 app selected, click a group to make a copy %d apps selected, click a group to move them %d apps selected, click a group to make copies Moved an app to %1$s Copied an app to %1$s Moved %1$d apps to %2$s Copied %1$d apps to %2$s Cleared selection Selected all visible apps
An update is available! You can update from version %1$s to %2$s, fully on-device. Continue Skip this Update Skipped version All updates hidden
Downloading Latest Version of %s You should get a prompt to install shortly.\n \nIf you accidentally dismissed it, didn\'t give permission, or got an error, you can try again from settings. Hide
Failed to download package! Make sure you have a good internet connection and try again later.
Skip updating to version %1$s? Updates are highly recommended and may include important fixes. \n \nIf you are avoiding this update due to an issue, please report it at github.com/threethan/LightningLauncher \n \nRegardless of your selection, you can update later from the settings. Skip This & Future Updates Skip This Update Dismiss
Saved configuration to Importing, please wait… Error while copying file!
Default Group Settings Current Default Groups:\n \n%1$s\n \nYou can change these by editing a group in edit mode. \n \nWhat would you like to do now?
Reset All Groups & Sort to Default Move everything to its Default Group Go Back, Don\'t do Anything Reset groups fully! Apps have been moved to your selected default groups
Set another group as default to unset this one
Default Icon Settings Lightning Launcher caches icons and banners for apps for faster loading. Lightning Launcher will download icons for Quest apps & games from the internet. \nBy clearing the icon cache, you also re-download these. You can set custom icons for apps by clicking the icon in the app\'s info popup. \nIf you want, you can also reset these.
Clear Icon Cache Clear Custom Icons Go Back, Don\'t do Anything
Icon cache has been cleared All icons have been reset to default
About Adding Websites
Uninstall / Remove Android App Info View Playtime Charts\nin Quest Game Tuner
Backup All Settings & Groupings Restore All Settings & Groupings
Hide this App Un-Hide this App
Moved to Hidden Group Moved to
google.com youtube.com discord.com/app open.spotify.com listen.tidal.com apkmirror.com apkpure.com
Shortcuts Shortcut Options Unfortunately, Android TV limits the functionality of accessibility services and third-party launchers. Return to Settings
Android TV Launcher Manager Install a third-party application which may allow you to change the default home on Android TV. \nThis requires ADB Debugging to be enabled, and may not work on every device. \n \nIf it doesn\'t install through here, look up "Android TV Launcher Manager XDA", then manually download & install. (Will not work on Fire TV)
Or… Just Use the Back Button! If you just use the back button on your remote, instead of the home button, you will always come back to Lightning Launcher. \n \nPressing back once you get to the launcher will just toggle edit mode, keeping you from accidentally returning to the default launcher.
Redirects open Lighting Launcher when hovering a dock icon. \nEach redirect must be individually installed, then activated.
You can add Lighting Launcher to directly to your dock! How to Add Lightning Launcher to the Quest Dock Adding LL to the Dock
Remove an existing icon 1. Close all other 2D and VR apps. \n2. Pick an icon to remove. (Camera or Browser) \n3. Click and hold the icon. \n4. Drag it down until it says \'Unpin\', then release. Feed, Store, and People can\'t be removed.
Add Lightning Launcher\'s Icon 1. Find Lightning Launcher in recent apps. \n\t\t(Right side of the dock) \n2. Drag Lightning Launcher to the left side. \n3. Release to pin it to the dock.
You can\'t have more than five apps pinned.
Add Dock Icon Redirect Built-In Icons
Feed Redirect Install then activate to open Lightning Launcher when you press the Horizon Feed button on the dock.
Library Redirect Install then activate to open Lightning Launcher when you hover the App Library button on the dock. Store Redirect Install then activate to open Lightning Launcher when you hover the Store button on the dock. People Redirect Install then activate to open Lightning Launcher when you hover the People button on the dock.
Install Update Activate Launch Deactivate Uninstall Installing… Installed Successfully
Unlock the Full Power of Your Quest. Meta limits the performance of apps. Quest Game Tuner breaks those limits, letting you get the most of the hardware you already own. You can also capture better videos, block ads, automatically power off, and more. \n \nQuest Game Tuner is the result of hundreds of hours of development, research, and testing by the same developer which made Lightning Launcher.
Get Quest Game Tuner on itch.io! threethan.itch.io/quest-game-tuner
Select an APK file to install
